name: ArkaPone
description:
Arkapone its a 2 players game versus that simulates retro games in a arcade machine!

-Controls:

P1: W/A/S/D And G to parry .

P2: UpArrow/DownArrow/LeftArrow/RightArrow And L to parry.

-Includes Arkapone, a mix into Clasic arcanoid and pong with new features like parry and differents powerUPs.

-And includes Arkamonke a cute minigame of two monkeys trying to catch fruits, beware of rotten ones.

This is a game made in the Retrogame Jam 2022, a video game creation competition held by the Universitat Politecnica de Valencia, which was the winner in the categories of game with the best gameplay, game with the best polish and best game in the competition.

The project is paused, maybe in the future more minigames and 1 player mode could be added, but unfortunately at the moment I don't have the means to continue investing time in development right now.

Hope you enjoyed!

#itchiocreatorday.
